flawed_nl_solution:
Being 7019 km the distance from Spain to Russia. To get from Germany to Russia, Peter has to travel 7019 - 1615 = <<7019-1615=5404>>5404 km
Knowing both distances, Peter will answer that he has to fly 5404 + 7019 = <<5404+7019=12419>>12419 km
#### 12419

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12423, not 12419. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
